title: Spoon, from a dessert service
description: Flatware dessert service, porcelain & vermeil in a leather box; hand painted Vermeille Set, comprising 12 forks, 12 knives, and 12 large spoons in original traveling leatrher box, with two trays.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Arthur Bliss Lane in memory of her husband, Mr. Arthur B. Lane
